blog.name: tjswings
blog.title: Of Course I Came
blog.description: Tyrus Shipper. DJ Fruity Stan. AM Enthusiast.  i write fics and obsess over details, join me

summary: PSA: guys the wish isn’t the thing being announced in 3.12 because josh said it was something no one had guess correctly yet and...
question: PSA: guys the wish isn’t the thing being announced in 3.12 because josh said it was something no one had guess correctly yet and a bunch of people have thought it was the wish
answer:
He said no one, that he has seen, had guessed correctly on what the emoji hint was. No on what is being revealed. 

I still think it’s pretty likely the wish is involved in 312 and when Josh said Jan he just wasn’t sure when the show was coming back. Based on the synopsis we have for 8 and 9, there really isn’t room for Andi to be revealing/dealing the wish.

blog.name: lemonboyandunderdog
blog.title: it’s loving tyrus hours
blog.description: ha gayy

summary: Thanks to anesthesia
body:
Thanks to anesthesia

“Cyrus has always had a fear of saying something stupid after getting his wisdom teeth taken out, and of course, he does just that.

OR

Cyrus is high on anesthesia and accidentally tells Tj that he thinks he’s cute.”


Ao3 link


Like many other people, Cyrus had had some good laughs over people who had just taken their wisdom teeth out and were high on anesthesia. They often say funny things, behave strangely and even though it’s a little bit mean, you can’t help but laugh when some of them think their own tongue is falling out. However, when it came to Cyrus himself, he was terrified. He had dreaded the day that he would get his wisdom teeth removed for ages for the simple reason that he might say something stupid or let something slip.


The dreaded day came on a frosty winter day when the first snow had just settled on the ground. Cyrus however, was not able to enjoy the snow, as he was going to the doctor to get his wisdom teeth removed. The procedure went just as planned, but after all, that was not what Cyrus was afraid of. In the car ride home, Cyrus’ dad and Sharon had enjoyed a little laugh at the random but funny comments Cyrus was making, but up until now, he had managed to get by without saying something he’d regret afterwards. Not long after they’d gotten home, a knock was heard on the door. Cyrus, who was upstairs in his room, didn’t notice, but Cyrus’ dad and Sharon exchanged a confused look as they weren’t expecting anyone. Cyrus dad went to open the door, only to find Tj standing outside.


“Tj! I wasn’t expecting you, but come in. You’re always welcome.” Norman happily greeted as he let the boy in. He had grown quite used to Tj’s presence, as he and Cyrus had been spending a lot of time together recently. Norman explained what Cyrus had gone through during the day, but told him to go to Cyrus’ room as he’d still enjoy the company. Tj, who was completely unaware of the fact that Cyrus had just gotten his wisdom teeth removed, said that he could come back some other time. Norman assured him that no, Cyrus would be happy to see him, he always was.


Tj made his way up the stairs and gently knocked on Cyrus’ door. He waited for a few seconds without receiving an answer, but decided to go in anyway. Cyrus was sitting on his bed, and seemed to not have noticed Tj’s knocking at all, as his face fell into shock as he saw the other boy. After just a few seconds though, Cyrus expression changed and he exclaimed:


“Teej!” He was wearing a huge (and adorable, according to Tj) grin.


“Hey, Underdog. I heard you got your wisdom teeth taken out today.” Tj replied as he sat down on the bed next to Cyrus.


Cyrus face turned into a confused look. “I did?”


Tj couldn’t help but laugh at the other boy and his obliviousness, everything he did turned out to be cute. ”Yeah, I’m pretty sure you did.” Tj chuckled and ruffled Cyrus hair playfully. Apparently, Cyrus didn’t take much convincing, as his face immediately went back to a grin.

Probably feeling inspired by Tj, Cyrus put both of his hands in Tj’s hair and ruffled it, causing most of the gel his had in his hair to disappear. Cyrus stopped after a few seconds and sat back and looked at Tj, as if he was examining him.


“Tj, why do you put gel in your hair all the time? You’re so cute without it.” Cyrus said bluntly, and Tj’s breath hitched. He did not expect that. He felt a blush spread across his cheeks, and faked a cough to not seem too flustered. “I- I uh…. I guess I’ve just never really liked my hair without gel.” Tj explained, to which Cyrus pouted.


“I like it. It’s cute. But that’s not really a surprise, everything about you is cute.” Cyrus said, and Tj almost choked. Cyrus, however, didn’t seem to register that he had said something strange and unexpected.


“What?”


“Yeah, you’re cute, Teej. Sometimes, actually most of the time, I just want to cup your face in my hands and kiss your cute lips on your cute face.” Cyrus was rambling by this point, going on and on about how cute Tj was, and Tj was completely in shock, his face as red as a tomato. Did Cyrus like him?


When Cyrus noticed that Tj didn’t say anything, his smile faded and he looked down in his lap. “Do- do you not want to kiss me back? Cyrus stuttered, pouting. Tj could not believe his ears, and he had to restrain himself from screaming out of excitement. He smiled at the boy sitting next to him.


“Cyrus, I do want to kiss you. I want to kiss you so bad, but you’re not really thinking straight right now, and I’m not kissing you while your high.” Tj explained, taking Cyrus’ hand in his. Cyrus pout grew even bigger.


Since Cyrus didn’t seem satisfied, Tj continued.“Okay, I’ll make you a deal. If you still want to kiss me tomorrow, let me know and I’ll be here in a heartbeat. If you don’t, then that’s fine. But if you do, just know that I’ve been waiting for that moment just as long as you have.”


Cyrus face lit up again.


“Deal.”

___



The following day, Tj felt his phone buzz in his pocket. He took it out to find a text from Cyrus.


Hey, Tj. I know I was pretty out of it yesterday, but I stand by my words. Come over? :)


As he read those words, Tj was scared that his heart was going to fall out of his chest from beating too hard. Millions of thoughts were running through his head and the biggest one was fuck yes. He quickly put on his coat and headed for Cyrus’ house, after all, he had promised to be there in a heartbeat. Thankfully, Cyrus lived not too far away, and he could easily walk there in 10 minutes. As he got closer to Cyrus’ house, he could see that the boy was already waiting for him on his front porch.


“Hi.” Tj greeted when he got close enough, suddenly feeling nervous. Was this really happening?


“You came.” Cyrus breathed.


“I said I would.”


“I know, I just doubted it. I was afraid I scared you off yesterday.”


“Scared me off? Not really, I quite liked hearing how cute and cute and cute you think I am.” Tj said, teasing him and giving him a light shove on his left shoulder. Cyrus blushed and looked down at their feet who were only inches apart, one step closer and they’d almost touch.


“To be fair, you are really cute.” Cyrus managed to get out,not knowing where that bravery suddenly came from. This time, it was Tj’s turn to blush. “Has anyone ever told you that you’re really cute, too?”


“Once or twice, it wouldn’t hurt to hear you say it, though.”


Tj took that extra step. They were almost touching now, but just almost.


“Cyrus Goodman, you are really cute.” He whispered as he examined every inch of the other boy’s face. He’d done it many times before, in class, at the spoon, when they were hanging out or at the swings, and Cyrus’ beauty would catch Tj’s breath every time.


After a few seconds of silence, Cyrus gently placed his hand on Tj’s cheek, and Tj put his arms around Cyrus’ waist. Before Tj could register what happened, his lips were on Cyrus’. They were a lot softer that he expected, and moved perfectly in sync with his own. They parted and all they could do was smile.


“Do it again.” Tj said.

summary: for the hint Josh gave us- do u think it could be that bex is pregnant or wants to have another kid? Josh said it was word play,...
question: for the hint Josh gave us- do u think it could be that bex is pregnant or wants to have another kid? Josh said it was word play, and it would make sense why the taco emoji didnt work... but I'm not sure about the sandwich one.
answer:
Idk I definitely always thought that Bex/Bowie wanting another kid was high on the possibility of what the wish was about. I think it still could be. 

For the hotdog/hamburger/sandwich hint, they all have a couple similarities. The ‘things in between things’ doesn’t work because taco doesn’t work. 

But the three of them all have bread, which a taco doesn’t, and they are all compound words, which taco isn’t. 

So there’s two ways you can kinda go with that. Especially considering he said it’s a play on words

The thing is, he definitely wouldn’t have given us something we could easily work out, especially since he said when 312 airs to go back and ask him about the hint..meaning even after we watch the episode, we still might not get it. Without knowing most of the content of the previous 4 episodes, and having no promos/clips/plot synopsis or even title for ep12, i really don’t think we’ll be able to figure it out. 

There are like endless possibilities to theorise on and i wish i could actually sit down and think about it but im hella busy/sick/in another country with limited internet. I do love just seeing how his hints and comments end up being connected when the episode premieres. Also i think this kinda guarantees Josh’ll be feeding us little by little throughout the hiatus in Jan so that’s nice

title: My sister is home for winter break and she was catching up on Andi Mack so I was watching along with her. I go are you getting a gay vibe between TJ & Cyrus. She goes I’m just trying to watch the show. Then we get to last episode where they are at the swingset and TJ pauses and says you are the only one I can talk to like this and after the scene she goes, “ I thought he was going to say you are the only person I’m in love with.”

blog.name: tjkiahgb
blog.title: TJ Kippen is a hashtag good boi
blog.description: Runner-up: "Funniest Blogger" - 2018 Andi Mack Blog Awards

summary:
On this week’s special Christmas episode of TJ and the Gals: Episode 1.05, “Joyeux
Ethël” TJ brings Cyrus over to Pearl's...
body:
On this week’s special Christmas episode of TJ and the Gals:

Episode 1.05, “Joyeux Ethël”

TJ brings Cyrus over to Pearl’s Pastries to celebrate Christmas Eve with the gals.

Everyone’s in a good mood except Ethel. She seems withdrawn.

“Ethel, are you okay?” TJ asks, but Ethel just waves him off.

Everyone sits down for dinner. Cyrus is a big hit with Barb and Dolores. He’s telling them stories about his Bubbe and they’re just eating it up.

TJ and Cyrus tell the gals about the whole thing with Reed and the gun.

“Wait, so go back… that Lester kid, does he ever talk?” Barb says.

TJ thinks for a second. “I don’t really know,” he says.

“He moves his mouth like he’s talking, but words never come out,” Cyrus says.

“That’s haunting,” says Dolores.

“So anyway,” TJ says. “Then I tell Cyrus he’s the only person I can talk to like this.”

“If that’s not the sweetest thing I ever heard,” says Barb.

“And I’d say our relationship’s better now than ever before because of all that,” TJ says. He pats Cyrus on the shoulder.

Cyrus smiles and nods.

Dolores puts her hands over her heart. Ethel still doesn’t say anything.


They finish dinner and go over to the small Christmas tree they have set-up to exchange a few presents.

TJ gives Dolores a new printing calculator. Dolores gets Barb some fancy sugars to use in baking. Dolores and Barb give TJ a green camouflage hoodie.

“You seem to like wearing these sort of things,” says Barb.

“It’s perfect,” says TJ.

Ethel walks in with several boxes and hands one to everyone. They open them up and find they’re empty.

“Ethel?” says Dolores.

“It’s to protest the commercialization of Christmas!” shouts Ethel.

“Oh stop,” says Barb. “You love the commercialization of Christmas.”

Ethel sighs. “I do.”

“You’ve been acting weird all day,” says Dolores.

“Well, weird in a different way than your normal weird, that is,” says Barb.

“What’s this really about?” says Dolores.

Ethel shakes her head and comes and sits with the group.

“I’ve just… I’ve been feeling lonely,” she says. “It’s the holidays and I’ve been thinking about those who are missing from my life.”

“Who are you talking about Ethel?” asks TJ.

“Paul. I just…” Ethel stops and takes a breath. “Paul would’ve loved this so much. Everyone gathered together for Christmas. Friends, loved ones, this kid I don’t know,” she says, pointing her finger at Cyrus.

“Cyrus,” Cyrus says, pointing at himself.

“I’m not going to remember it,” says Ethel.

“Okay,” says Cyrus.

“My point is,” says Ethel. “Love the ones you have while you still have them. You never know when’s the last time you’ll see them.”

Everyone smiles. The audience goes awwww.

TJ leans in to Barb. “Who’s Paul?”

Barb shrugs.

“Wait,” says Dolores. “Wasn’t Paul the name of the bobcat you kept in the basement?”

“Yeah, who did you think I was talking about?” says Ethel.

“Wasn’t the bobcat a girl?” asks TJ.

“What does that have to do with anything?” says Ethel.

“Never mind,” says TJ.

Ethel throws her arms up for a hug.

“Merry Christmas everyone,” says Ethel. She looks at Cyrus. “Oh, happy winter solstice.”

“I’m Jewish,” Cyrus says.

“Merry Festivus?”

“Have you never heard of Hanukkah?”

“That’s the one! That was my next guess,” says Ethel.

“Sure,” says Cyrus.

Everyone shares a nice group hug. The audience goes awwww again.

They finish exchanging gifts.


“Well, I think Cyrus and I need to head back before it gets late,” TJ says.

Everyone gets up to see them off. TJ and Cyrus head outside, get on their bikes, and ride off together.

The gals wave to them from the doorway. After a little while, the two are out of sight.

Dolores turns to Barb.

“So was he his boyfriend or what?”

Barb shrugs.

“Hell if I know. Seemed pretty gay to me.”

Dolores nods.

Barb closes the door and locks it, and the gals head back upstairs for the night.

“Ethel?” says Dolores.

“It’s to protest the commercialization of Christmas!” shouts Ethel.

“Oh stop,” says Barb. “You love the commercialization of Christmas.”

Ethel sighs. “I do.”

“You’ve been acting weird all day,” says Dolores.

“Well, weird in a different way than your normal weird, that is,” says Barb.

“What’s this really about?” says Dolores.

Ethel shakes her head and comes and sits with the group.

“I’ve just… I’ve been feeling lonely,” she says. “It’s the holidays and I’ve been thinking about those who are missing from my life.”

“Who are you talking about Ethel?” asks TJ.

“Paul. I just…” Ethel stops and takes a breath. “Paul would’ve loved this so much. Everyone gathered together for Christmas. Friends, loved ones, this kid I don’t know,” she says, pointing her finger at Cyrus.

“Cyrus,” Cyrus says, pointing at himself.

“I’m not going to remember it,” says Ethel.

“Okay,” says Cyrus.

“My point is,” says Ethel. “Love the ones you have while you still have them. You never know when’s the last time you’ll see them.”

Everyone smiles. The audience goes awwww.

TJ leans in to Barb. “Who’s Paul?”

Barb shrugs.

“Wait,” says Dolores. “Wasn’t Paul the name of the bobcat you kept in the basement?”

“Yeah, who did you think I was talking about?” says Ethel.

“Wasn’t the bobcat a girl?” asks TJ.

“What does that have to do with anything?” says Ethel.

“Never mind,” says TJ.

Ethel throws her arms up for a hug.

“Merry Christmas everyone,” says Ethel. She looks at Cyrus. “Oh, happy winter solstice.”

“I’m Jewish,” Cyrus says.

“Merry Festivus?”

“Have you never heard of Hanukkah?”

“That’s the one! That was my next guess,” says Ethel.

“Sure,” says Cyrus.

Everyone shares a nice group hug. The audience goes awwww again.

They finish exchanging gifts.


“Well, I think Cyrus and I need to head back before it gets late,” TJ says.

Everyone gets up to see them off. TJ and Cyrus head outside, get on their bikes, and ride off together.

The gals wave to them from the doorway. After a little while, the two are out of sight.

Dolores turns to Barb.

“So was he his boyfriend or what?”

Barb shrugs.

“Hell if I know. Seemed pretty gay to me.”

Dolores nods.

Barb closes the door and locks it, and the gals head back upstairs for the night.

trail.content_raw:
On this week’s special Christmas episode of TJ and the Gals:

Episode 1.05, “Joyeux Ethël”

TJ brings Cyrus over to Pearl’s Pastries to celebrate Christmas Eve with the gals.

Everyone’s in a good mood except Ethel. She seems withdrawn.

“Ethel, are you okay?” TJ asks, but Ethel just waves him off.

Everyone sits down for dinner. Cyrus is a big hit with Barb and Dolores. He’s telling them stories about his Bubbe and they’re just eating it up.

TJ and Cyrus tell the gals about the whole thing with Reed and the gun.

“Wait, so go back… that Lester kid, does he ever talk?” Barb says.

TJ thinks for a second. “I don’t really know,” he says.

“He moves his mouth like he’s talking, but words never come out,” Cyrus says.

“That’s haunting,” says Dolores.

“So anyway,” TJ says. “Then I tell Cyrus he’s the only person I can talk to like this.”

“If that’s not the sweetest thing I ever heard,” says Barb.

“And I’d say our relationship’s better now than ever before because of all that,” TJ says. He pats Cyrus on the shoulder.

Cyrus smiles and nods.

Dolores puts her hands over her heart. Ethel still doesn’t say anything.


They finish dinner and go over to the small Christmas tree they have set-up to exchange a few presents.

TJ gives Dolores a new printing calculator. Dolores gets Barb some fancy sugars to use in baking. Dolores and Barb give TJ a green camouflage hoodie.

“You seem to like wearing these sort of things,” says Barb.

“It’s perfect,” says TJ.

Ethel walks in with several boxes and hands one to everyone. They open them up and find they’re empty.

“Ethel?” says Dolores.

“It’s to protest the commercialization of Christmas!” shouts Ethel.

“Oh stop,” says Barb. “You love the commercialization of Christmas.”

Ethel sighs. “I do.”

“You’ve been acting weird all day,” says Dolores.

“Well, weird in a different way than your normal weird, that is,” says Barb.

“What’s this really about?” says Dolores.

Ethel shakes her head and comes and sits with the group.

“I’ve just… I’ve been feeling lonely,” she says. “It’s the holidays and I’ve been thinking about those who are missing from my life.”

“Who are you talking about Ethel?” asks TJ.

“Paul. I just…” Ethel stops and takes a breath. “Paul would’ve loved this so much. Everyone gathered together for Christmas. Friends, loved ones, this kid I don’t know,” she says, pointing her finger at Cyrus.

“Cyrus,” Cyrus says, pointing at himself.

“I’m not going to remember it,” says Ethel.

“Okay,” says Cyrus.

“My point is,” says Ethel. “Love the ones you have while you still have them. You never know when’s the last time you’ll see them.”

Everyone smiles. The audience goes awwww.

TJ leans in to Barb. “Who’s Paul?”

Barb shrugs.

“Wait,” says Dolores. “Wasn’t Paul the name of the bobcat you kept in the basement?”

“Yeah, who did you think I was talking about?” says Ethel.

“Wasn’t the bobcat a girl?” asks TJ.

“What does that have to do with anything?” says Ethel.

“Never mind,” says TJ.

Ethel throws her arms up for a hug.

“Merry Christmas everyone,” says Ethel. She looks at Cyrus. “Oh, happy winter solstice.”

“I’m Jewish,” Cyrus says.

“Merry Festivus?”

“Have you never heard of Hanukkah?”

“That’s the one! That was my next guess,” says Ethel.

“Sure,” says Cyrus.

Everyone shares a nice group hug. The audience goes awwww again.

They finish exchanging gifts.


“Well, I think Cyrus and I need to head back before it gets late,” TJ says.

Everyone gets up to see them off. TJ and Cyrus head outside, get on their bikes, and ride off together.

The gals wave to them from the doorway. After a little while, the two are out of sight.

Dolores turns to Barb.

“So was he his boyfriend or what?”

Barb shrugs.

“Hell if I know. Seemed pretty gay to me.”

Dolores nods.

Barb closes the door and locks it, and the gals head back upstairs for the night.

summary:
Scott (director of red) likes dogs
Parker (James) likes black panthers
Noelle (Aaron's sister mikaela) likes all felines, but...
body:
Scott (director of red) likes dogs

Parker (James) likes black panthers

Noelle (Aaron’s sister mikaela) likes all felines, but wild cats especially
